name: mcp-lsp-gateway
description: Local-only, read-only MCP server (Protocol 2025-11-25) exposing VS Code language features to GPT-5.2-Codex over Streamable HTTP.

untrustedWorkspaces.description: This extension exposes workspace content over a local HTTP server and is disabled in Restricted Mode.

commands.title: MCP LSP Gateway: Set Bearer Token(s)
MCP LSP Gateway: Clear Bearer Token(s)
MCP LSP Gateway: Copy MCP Endpoint URL
MCP LSP Gateway: Copy Codex config.toml (Token Inline)

mcpLspGateway.enabled.description: Enable the local MCP HTTP server. Disabled by default to reduce accidental exposure; when enabled the server is localhost-only and read-only.

mcpLspGateway.bindAddress.description: Bind address for the local MCP HTTP server. v1 is localhost-only.

mcpLspGateway.port.description: TCP port for the local MCP HTTP server.

mcpLspGateway.endpointPath.description: Single MCP endpoint path for Streamable HTTP.

mcpLspGateway.secretStorageKey.description: SecretStorage key used to store bearer token(s). Use the provided commands to set/clear tokens; tokens are never stored in settings.

mcpLspGateway.allowedOrigins.description: If the Origin header is present, it must exactly match one of these values; otherwise requests are rejected.

mcpLspGateway.additionalAllowedRoots.description: Additional filesystem roots (absolute paths) allowed for URI gating, in addition to workspace folders.

mcpLspGateway.enableSessions.description: If true, mint MCP-Session-Id on initialize response and require it for subsequent requests. Sessions are not authentication.

mcpLspGateway.maxItemsPerPage.description: Server-side hard cap for paged results (references, workspaceSymbols, workspace diagnostics).

mcpLspGateway.maxResponseBytes.description: Hard cap on response payload size in bytes.

mcpLspGateway.requestTimeoutMs.description: Hard cap on per-request processing time.

mcpLspGateway.debugLogging.description: Opt-in debug logging. Must redact secrets and never log raw request bodies.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run compile-tests
